thread.title: Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik Get Personalized Heinz Bean Can - Weird Celeb Couple Gifts
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik Get Personalized Heinz Bean Can - Weird Celeb Couple Gifts

author: Alyssa Bailey
title: Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik Get Personalized Heinz Bean Can - Weird Celeb Couple Gifts
text: Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik Receive the Weirdest Romantic Gift Getty By Alyssa Bailey Feb 21, 2017 This weekend in London, top model/foodie Gigi Hadid received a couple of Heinz beans cans with the most romantic of touches: a personalized "Gigi & Zayn's" label. Hadid was obsessed with them—and the brand's modified slogan: Snapchat Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Heinz appears to have sent them to her, although it's unclear whether the company did it on its own or Malik gave them a nudge. Whatever the case, someone saw Hadid's London Evening Standard interview from way back in September , where Hadid explained that Malik got her hooked on the product. "I'm loving Heinz baked beans in the morning, yeah and Z cooks a lot," she said. "He makes a brilliant curry. Butter chicken is his signature dish. Don't worry—he's representing good for the British boys!" More from ELLE:
